version_description: Fixes and Tune-ups

Fix for Electron Volts conversions
Added reverse Velocity conversions: i.e. hour/Km, min/cm, sec/m
Added basic Graphing for CALC Prime users (experimental)
Some other tweaks :-)

Fix for reverse Velocity conversions: i.e. hour/Km, min/cm, sec/m
Some minor tweaks ~ keep the feedback coming :-)

New Scientific Portrait setting
(Trick: Tap & Hold Options for quick ON/OFF)
Themes tune-ups and improvements
Reverse fraction precision increased to 1/999
History Archiving automation
New interactive Tutorial!
Quite a few fixes and tune-ups...
Keep the feedback coming! :-)
